description:
Mori Kumi is a member of http://anidb.net/ch2350 [Otome]`s gang who frequently perform their mobbing attacks against http://anidb.net/ch2345 [Kotonoha].
Amongst these she`s the most harmless one and stands out for her care-free, hyped-up behavior, most notably in terms of relationships where she is cagey about her boyfriend and frequently teases her friends with insinuations, never actually telling them who her partner actually is.
name: Mori Kumi
